attributes.long-description:
Experience award-winning flOw, now available on PS4™, PS3™, and PS Vita systems.

flOw is a game about piloting an aquatic organism through a surreal biosphere where players consume other organisms, evolve, and dive into the abyss. With an embedded design of DDA (dynamic difficulty adjustment), players with differing skill levels can intuitively customize their game experience and enjoy the game at their own pace.

You can play as one of 5 creatures, each in a unique environment. Lose yourself in the crisp “deep blue” in an organic experience that will allow you to glide, flit, and flOw through the universe.

Key Features
• Full HD at 1080p – Vibrant environments.
• Dynamically Adjusting Experience – Customize your game experience.
• Multiplayer mode – 1-4 players; same screen.
• Fully controlled by motion sensors to glide, flit, and flOw through the abyss.

For one price, get flOw on PS4™, PS3™ and PlayStation®Vita systems. Purchase it on your PS Vita system and it will automatically appear for download on your PS4™ and PS3™ systems at no additional cost.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. One-time license fee for play on purchasing account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4 systems when signed in with purchasing account.  Purchasing account may download item to up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems and 2 activated PS3™ systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

flOw ©2007 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Created and developed by thatgamecompany. PS4™ and PS Vita development by SuperVillain Studios.
attributes.name: flOw PS Vita
